## About Numbers
Numbers reimagines spreadsheet software with a focus on visual appeal and user-friendly design, making data organization and analysis accessible to everyone. Unlike traditional spreadsheet applications, Numbers provides a free-form canvas where users can place multiple tables, charts, images, and text anywhere on the sheet. This approach encourages creative data presentation while maintaining powerful calculation capabilities for complex numerical tasks.

The desktop version offers full compatibility with both macOS and Windows operating systems, ensuring seamless collaboration across different platforms. With support for Apple Pencil on compatible devices, real-time collaboration features, and extensive template options, Numbers serves as a versatile tool for personal budgeting, business reporting, academic research, and project planning. The application maintains full compatibility with Microsoft Excel files while offering unique features that enhance data visualization and presentation quality.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   2 GB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   2 GB of available storage space
